entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
